turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, I'd like to get a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a cinnamon shortbread latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. Could I have a nonfat milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and What size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Short, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, one moment while i order that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered a short, cinnamon shortbread latte with non-fat milk to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I need to change the location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which starbucks would you like to have your drink picked up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be on Clinton Avenue in Cortlandt, New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, what was the city again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Portland, New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have sent your order to the starbucks on clinton avenue in courland new york.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's it. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye-bye.
